posts.title: 90 Degree Angle Scissors
posts.content: Now you can achieve razor straight cuts with ease using these 90 degree angle scissors. The ergonomic design keeps your hands out of the way while cutting, while the heavy duty construction allows you to cut through tough materials without breaking a sweat.

posts.title: Quick Thawing Plate
posts.content: Easily defrost your frozen meats using this quick thawing plate. Instead of relying on batteries or electricity, the plate features embedded heat pipes and a microfin structure that dissipates cold and draws ambient warmth to the surface for quick thawing.

posts.title: The Simpsons LEGO Kwik-E-Mart
posts.content: Keep your LEGO Springfielders satisfied by fulfilling all their shopping needs with The Simpsons LEGO Kwik-E-Mart. Springfield’s beloved convenience store features a removable roof and comes with Chief Wiggum and his cruiser in tow to keep Snake in line.

posts.title: Cat Scratch Turntable
posts.content: Let Whiskers practice his wicked DJ skills while also keeping his nails sharp and trim with the cat scratch turntable. These turntable shaped scratching posts actually spin when your feline digs into them and will entertain both you and him for hours on end.

posts.title: Artificial Snowballs
posts.content: Don’t let the summer heat stop you from having playful battles with your friends – now with these artifical snowballs you can wage war all year round without the messy wet slush! Each packet includes twenty snowballs so you’ll have plenty of ammo.

posts.title: Bulk Grocery Bag Holding Tool
posts.content: Carry everything at once using the bulk grocery bag holding tool and make second trips from the car to your home obsolete. This heavy duty tool is ideal for carrying multiple bags at once and also works great to carry gear on a baby stroller.

posts.title: Octopus Shower Caddy
posts.content: Keep your shower area mess-free at all times by hanging up this little octopus shower caddy. This helpful cephalopod comes with nine dangling and flexible tentacles with adjustable loops so that you can hang everything from shampoo bottles to razors and cloths.

posts.title: Mini Golf Mug
posts.content: Now you can practice your golf putt like a real executive with the mini golf mug. Apart from holding your morning cup of Joe, the mug includes a tunnel  opening at the bottom so you can keep your skills sharp and make the workday go by a whole lot quicker.

posts.title: Night Visibility Safety Light Strip
posts.content: Ensure you’re seen by approaching traffic when you’re jogging or walking at night by equipping your shoes with this night visibility safety light strip. It comes with a replaceable battery and can be easily be attached to any shoe.

posts.title: LED Clutch Bag
posts.content: Stand apart from the crowd when you go out at night by accessorizing with this LED clutch bag. This wearable piece of art features a compact size and allows you to customize the images on your bag using an App on your phone with over 20 animations.

posts.title: Kettlebell Free Weight Attachment Grip
posts.content: Get the most out of your home gym equipment by adding versatility to your workout using this kettlebell free weight attachment grip. The lightweight grip snaps around any dumbbell’s handle so that you can use it exactly like a regular kettlebell.

posts.title: Ghostbusters Model Car
posts.content: No vehicle is more fit for the title of Hawttt Hot Wheels than the Ecto-1 Ghostbuster mobile. This extremely detailed 1:18 scale die-cast replica is a must have item for Ghostbusters fans, vintage Cadillac lovers, and unusual movie prop collectors.
